alert.note: Alert for San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:24PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Archuleta County through 700 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Pagosa Springs, or 19 miles northwest of Dulce, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size or slightly larger- sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pagosa Springs. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 124 and 143. Colorado 151 between mile markers 29 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
